title: Hidden Turkey: Authentic Mediterranean Luxury - Includes Daily Breakfasts, Nightly Dinners and Boat Trip
description: Experience Turkey like never before with an utterly unique stay at the breathtaking Dionysos Village Hotel. A village-style resort positioned high up in the mountains, this luxurious property boasts stunning views of the ocean and a garden with olive groves, vineyards, herbs and fruit trees. Included in your getaway is daily breakfast, nightly three-course dinner, return airport transfers, a five-hour boat trip with lunch and drinks, and more.
